data.name: Goblin Quest: Escape! - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the official soundtrack for the game Goblin Quest: Escape!

Track Listing


1. Laser Tasilo - Escape Song
2. Laser Tasilo - The One That Never Made It
3. David Kalmar - Mook Base
4. David Kalmar - Droppy D Trailer Song
5. David Kalmar - Tappy Guitar
6. David Kalmar - Goblin Boogie
7. David Kalmar - Mook's Triolin

pc_requirements.minimum:
최소:
  • 운영체제: Windows XP
  • 프로세서: Any
  • 메모리: 1024 MB RAM
  • 그래픽: Any
  • 저장공간: 100 MB 사용 가능 공간
  • 사운드카드: Any

권장:
  • 운영체제: Windows 7
  • 프로세서: Any
  • 메모리: 1024 MB RAM
  • 그래픽: Any
  • 저장공간: 100 MB 사용 가능 공간
  • 사운드카드: Any
